attributes.name: summary
attributes.value: Chinese electric vehicle companies are increasingly pivoting towards humanoid robots, showcasing 16 of them at the highly viewed 2025 CCTV New Year Gala.

attributes.name: summary
attributes.value: Sougwen Chung, a Canadian-Chinese artist, collaborates with AI to leverage its capabilities rather than viewing it as a threat to artistic authenticity.

attributes.name: summary
attributes.value: Researchers have developed an AI model that can predict and generate protein localization, which could have significant implications for disease understanding and treatments.

attributes.name: summary
attributes.value: A new innovative entertainment revolution is underway, driven by emerging technologies like AI, which is reshaping content creation and consumption.
